profileAlternative.name: Kavita Trivedi
profileAlternative.headline: Senior SQL Server DBA at Bank of America
profileAlternative.summary:
EXPERIENCE AND CERTIFICATION
• 17+ years of experience – Senior SQL Server Database Administrator
• MCSA (Ongoing): SQL Server 2012 (Completed: Querying Microsoft SQL Server 2012)
• MCITP (Charter Member): SQL Server 2005 (Microsoft Certified IT Professional )
• MCDBA: SQL Server 2000 (Microsoft Certified Database Administrator)
• MCDBA: SQL Server 7.0 (Microsoft Certified Database Administrator)

SUMMARY:
• Installation, Consolidation, Configuration Setup of SQL Server 2012, 2008, 2005, 2000 and 7.0
• Worked with Application Team in AGILE Environment
• Administration, Maintenance, Production Support of 1000+ Production, UAT, QA, Development
Instances.
• SQL Server Migration / Upgrade from SQL Server 2000 to SQL Server 2008, SQL Server 2000 to
SQL Server 2005, and other environments
• Setup High Availability Failover Cluster (n+1) [Active / Active/ Passive] & [Active / Passive] in
SQL Server 2008 and SQL Server 2005
• Setup Log Shipping, Mirroring in SQL Server 2008, SQL Server 2005
• Setup Transactional Replication using Remote Distributor and Multiple Subscribers
• Setup of Maintenance Jobs for Backup / Restore using SQL Lite Speed (VLDB), Native Backup
• Setup Re-Indexing, Index Defragmentation, Selective Re-Indexing on the basis of Fragmentation,
Update Statistics, Integrity Checks, Other Database Maintenance Checks
• Design and Setup of SQL Server Security – Active Directory Groups, Logins, Database Roles
• Setup / Configuration / Administration of SSRS, SSAS, SSIS in SQL Server 2012 / 2008 / 2000
(DTS)
• Setup / Configured Database Compression (Row / Page) in SQL Server 2008 for Application Databases
• Performance Tuning and Optimization – using System Monitor (Performance Monitor), SQL Server Profiler, Database Management Views (DMV)
• Troubleshooting – Resolving issues within defined SLAs, working with vendors, Project
Management, Application Team, Strategic Guidance
• Led Project for remediating security as per Security Baselines.

positions.title: Senior SQL Server Database Administrator
positions.description:
• Setup, Administration and Maintenance of SQL Server Instances
• Worked closely with Application Team in AGILE Environment to understand Business Logic
• Involved in Capacity Planning and Environment Setup including Storage, Memory, I/O as per
Business SLA
• Setup, Configured Transactional Replication of Multiple Application Databases on Publisher /
Remote Distributor / Multiple Subscribers, Troubleshooting Replication Agents for
Performance as well as Failures
• Setup Database Maintenance Jobs including Re-indexing, De-Fragmentation for VLDB
Databases.
• Setup Disaster Recovery Server using Log Shipping, Mirroring.
• Setup Database [Page / Row] level Compression.
• Performed Disaster Recovery Tests (DR Tests)
• Migration, Upgrade, Consolidation from SQL Server 2000 to SQL Server 2008 (Including
Transactional Replication) in Active / Active / Passive Microsoft SQL Server Cluster
Environment.
• Migration, Upgrade, Consolidation from SQL Server 2000 to SQL Server 2008.
• Migration from SQL Server 2008 to SQL Server 2012
• Setup Backup / Restore Strategy for VLDB Databases
• Performance and Tuning of SQL Server Databases (SQL Server 2008 / SQL Server 2005/
SQL Server 2000) using Performance Monitor, Index Tuning Wizard, DMVs and SQL Profiler.
• Documentation, Troubleshooting, On-Call 24x7 Support
• Installation, Configuration and Security Setup for SSAS / SSRS / SSIS in SQL Server 2012,
SQL Server 2008, SQL Server 2005
• Led Project related to Security Implementation / Remediation as per Security Baseline

(Environment: SQL Server 2012, SQL Server 2008, SQL Server 2005, SQL Server 2000, Windows 2008 R2, Windows Server 2008, Windows Server 2003, IIS 7.0, IIS 6.0, .NET)
…
see more

• Setup Disaster Recovery Server using Mirroring / Log Shipping
• Setup SSAS / SSRS / SSIS in SQL Server 2005, SQL Server 2000
• Performed Disaster Recovery Tests for SQL Server Database Servers
• Performance and Tuning of SQL Server Databases using Performance Monitor, SQL Server
Profiler and DMVs
• Worked on SOX Compliance Audit Guidelines and Remediation
• Migration, Upgrade from SQL Server 2000 to SQL Server 2005

(Environment: SQL Server 2005, SQL Server 2000, Windows Server 2003)

positions.title: Senior SQL Server Database Administrator
positions.description:
• Setup, Administration and Maintenance of SQL Server Instances in Production /
Non-Production Environments.
• Design and Implement Backup and Recovery for SQL Server 2000 and SQL Server 2005
Database Servers using SQL Lite Speed, includes Full Backup and Point in Time Recovery
• Setup Disaster Recovery Server using Mirroring / Log Shipping
• Setup and configured SSIS / DTS in SQL Server 2005, SQL Server 2000
• Performed Disaster Recovery Tests for SQL Server Database Servers
• Performance and Tuning of SQL Server Databases using Performance Monitor, SQL Server
Profiler and DMVs
• Worked on SOX Compliance Audit Guidelines and Remediation
• Migration, Upgrade from SQL Server 2000 to SQL Server 2005
• 24x7 Production Support

(Environment: SQL Server 2005, SQL Server 2000, Windows Server 2003, Windows Server 2000)
…
see more

positions.title: Senior SQL Server Database Administrator
positions.description:
• Setup, Administration and Maintenance of SQL Server Instances
• Designed and Built utility to automate migration from SQL Server 7.0 to SQL Server 2000,
the number of instance migrated were 1200+.
• Designed and Built Automated Table / Stored Procedure Transactional Replication in SQL
Server 7.0, SQL Server 2000. Automated Replication scripts were setup for Transactional
Replication Topology Publisher / Distributor -> Subscriber. This environment had 1200
Servers participating in Pub -> Sub Replication Setup.
• Design / Implement database backup and recovery for SQL Server 2000 and 7.0 Servers.
• Involved in Database Sizing and Capacity Planning of Database Servers involving Future
enhancements and better performance.
• Designed and Created Database Standards including Standards and Best Practices for
Replication, Database Objects etc.
• Troubleshoot Performance Issues using Performance Monitor and SQL Server Profiler.

(Environment: SQL Server 2000, SQL Server 7.0, Windows Server 2000, Windows NT 4.0)
…
see more

• Involved in Database Design using ERWIN
• Created Database Design, Standards and Best Practices to be implemented

(Environment: SQL Server 7.0, ERWIN, Windows NT 4.0, IIS Server 4.0. ASP, VB Script, JAVA Script)

Analyzed the business needs, design and developed Banking System as a member of Technical Architect Team. The system included various modules to automate the banks and on-line processing of the banks.
• Setup, Administration and Maintenance of SQL Server Instances (SQL Server 6.5)
• Performance Tuning of database objects
• Use Power Designer to design logical and physical model of the database.

Technical Business Analyst with strong SQL and Data Analysis
VP; Programmer Professional MKTS - Enterprise Capital Management Tech at Bank of America
